scripts.build: npm run clean && cp -r api/. build && npm run build-hugo && npm run process-html
scripts.build-hugo: npm run drac && hugo && rm -rf tmp && cp -r build/static tmp
scripts.build-quick: npm run clean && cp -r tmp build/static && npm run process-html
scripts.dev-api: (pm2 delete printboy || true) && pm2 start api/index.js --watch --attach --name=printboy -- --cors='http://localhost:1313'
scripts.drac: rm -rf static/third_party/dracula-ui && mkdir -p static/third_party/dracula-ui && cp -r node_modules/@gauntface/dracula-ui/styles/ static/third_party/dracula-ui
scripts.process-html: npm run html-assets && npm run minify-html
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run prod-api
scripts.prod-api: (pm2 delete printboy || true) && pm2 start build/index.js --name=printboy
scripts.prod-api-attach: (pm2 delete printboy || true) && pm2 start build/index.js --name=printboy --attach
scripts.setup: (pm2 delete printboy || true) && pm2 start index.js --name=printboy && pm2 startup systemd && pm2 save
